Reviews.Title: “Very good; location, cleanliness, and staff...”
Reviews.Author: Mohammed_Omar
Reviews.Content: booked hotel 7night trip istanbul hotel central terms location resturants shops literaly doors steps famous shopping streets 2 minutes underground station infront worth mentions modern clean importantly bathroom truly modern decoration breakfast limited selections omlet eggs cost 8 turkish bothering single lift time serve floors normal wait 5 minutes ride tidy friendly staff central location compensated negative 2 mentioned recommend busy nights prefer city centre

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel, Fantastic Location”
Reviews.Author: hotelhopper87
Reviews.Content: trip turkey didnt expect negative reviews hotel mainly renovated 2012 hotel absolutely fantastic staff friendly clean tidy location taksim square parallel istiklal street stayed friend standard twin beds comfortable stay included free wifi free breakfast alright variety wasnt start day definitely recommend hotel definitely consider staying trip

Reviews.Title: “Classy hotel, Excellent rooms, Amazing location”
Reviews.Author: xopolkadot84ox
Reviews.Content: mum sister returned hotel stayed family jan 2012 chosen close proximity taksim square appeared standard price arrival pleased choice hotel excellent location literally 5 doors start istiklal street taksim sqaure classy brand fittings beds furniture extremely clean look exactly professional pictures appear hotels website previously stayed five star elite world hotel taksim sqaure honestly standard minibarfridge kettle teacoffee tv 4 channels turkish safe website microwave definitely stayed family single bed double bed free complementary wifi connection slow tempermental bathroom grey marble clean fancy fittings including marble sink bidet toilet rainshower head hairdryer using rainshower head water leaked onto tiled floor downfall buffet breakfast served 7am 10 30 am slightly varied day selection 4 hot dishes scrambled eggs arabic pastry halal sausages stir fry buffet included selection cheeses dried fruit figs olives yoghurts cereals breads complementary cherry orange juice tea turkish style coffee drinks seperately waiter service hotel staff friendly hand extremely difficult communicate daytime staff neither spoke nor understood english difficult communicate simple milk tea 2 clean glasses instead brought 2 tea bags issue discovered reception night male manager office day fluent english help locations directions day found staff hotel street corner facing metro spoke excellent english particular reception worker named helpful willing help location hotel line minimarts bakery money exchange takeaway restaurants practically night money exchange closes midnight 23 minimarts exchange pounds euros handy shisha cafe literally 2 doors left hotel metro 2 min walk starbucks opposite street hotel lively 5am feels safe police checkpoint little noisy night lot people expect pay 50 55 taxi ataturk airport hotel maximum 25 blue mosque enjoyed stay hotel especially loved amazing location hotel defintely recommending hotel friends family hope return soon

Reviews.Title: “An Excellent choice for a group of friends”
Reviews.Author: Allam_Abeer
Reviews.Content: friends stayed family positive 1 location excellent close shopping close metro bus station 2 service clean polite staff excellent breakfast 3 beds comfortable negative minor 1 lift hotel wait little 2 internet connection slow fast sitting outside 3 breakfast generous variety wasnt 4 variety tv channels enjoyed stay stay recommend hotel

Reviews.Content: reservation travel agency told clean reasonably price hotel city stayed family 4 2 adults 2 children liked hotel familiy double bed single bed crossed street reached istiklal stuff smile helpfull

Reviews.Author: aw_berlin2001
Reviews.Content: complete renovation hotel avoided april 2011 hotel definitely ready receive guests noisy clue straight summit stay constuction 2am incl drilling bother apologise internet free connexion slow avoid entire taksim popular tourist avoided bad tourist traps nice istanbul people nice cheating

Reviews.Title: “Not recommended; aweful experience”
Reviews.Author: RihamR
Reviews.Content: worse experience hotel despite perfect location middle taksim facing istiklal street makes easy night hotel disgustingly furniture reception restaurant checkin fine elevators occupies guests sticking space bags stuffy dark beds clean odour bathroom basin toilet manageable bath tub feeling bath tub collapse floor bed third night bitten ankle ant mosquito itchy restaurant ground stuffy poorly furnished staff busy chatting food variety tasty quality worse happened third day returning evening shopping heading electronic key didnt tried times luck friend descended reception assitance rep reception told housekeeping collected stuff bathroom bags moved stuff 1st floor notifying guest stay beside friend decided god idea hospitality ofcourse cant overlook communication location staff cant speak english words

Reviews.Content: bed linen holes bathroom smells mould windows dont close wind blows roomalso window recess noise loud sleep horn

Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights everyday hour hotel comes feeling terrible beds sheets clean curtains torn water flows bath tub insects fond ac istanbul nice city avoid hotel stay nice
